entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Jasper
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 09:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:29 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 06:29 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:29 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
